attributes.action: Close schools in counties affected with Coronavirus (COVID-19).
attributes.additional_details: While the death rate is small is still can affect children with weak immune systems and is the best plan to protect them. We need to act now to prevent the spread of the virus. Schools are a hotspot for the virus to spread and students will spend times in confined hallways, classrooms etc. and by having the schools closed for an agreed amount of time can help reduce the spreading of the virus.
attributes.background: Schools in the counties across the UK should be closed for an agreed amount of time to prevent Coronavirus reaching children.
